title: How Do You Sell Your Item
body: Hi, So I took a break and came up a little bit... and the game has changed so much.. I don't even know how to sell an item? Say you accidentally bought an item.. or  want to replace an item?

replies.body: You click ont he item and press the sell button, or if you've just bought it, you can press undo and it'll undo the last buy (with a few exceptions that you can't undo, I think GA might be one).
